lines.text: Get your things off. It's your wedding day, you wanna look nice.
What a beautiful nightgown; and it's a shortie!
You know, you have very nice legs.
Nice stockings too. What holds your stockings up?
There's a lot your mother should have told you.
I didn't ask my mother. I asked you.
You think if you're drunk, it doesn't count, huh?

[as he's holding Nancy tight in her apartment's doorway]
I should have a permit.
Do explorers have to have permits?
They should have, especially when they're headed for uncharted territory.
[Nancy pushes away from Ed and glares at him]
Forgive me angel, I know not what I say.
